EmailTemplate.description: Group Serve Reminder sent to Group Contact
EmailTemplate.name: 245005 Group Serve Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder - upcoming Group Serve Day at Mobile Loaves & Fishes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},
This is a friendly reminder about your organization's upcoming Group Serve Day at Community First! Village on {{{GW_Volunteers__Volunteer_Hours__c.GW_Volunteers__Shift_Start_Date_Time__c}}}for {{{GW_Volunteers__Volunteer_Hours__c.Volunteer_Job_Name__c}}}at {{{GW_Volunteers__Volunteer_Hours__c.fortafy_JobLocationFullAddress__c}}}.
We appreciate you coordinating this event with your organization's attendees. Here is a list of attendees who have signed up for this event.
<Volunteer Name> <Volunteer Hours Status> <Volunteer Email> <Volunteer Phone>
Please review the attached instructions carefully.
Click HERE < https://mlf.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/front-porch-check-in.jpg > to view a map to help you find your way.
If you need to cancel your organization's Group Serve day, or if you have any questions, please feel free to respond to this email directly. We are here to help!
Thank you from all of us at Mobile Loaves & Fishes! We look forward to seeing you soon!
Form: 245005
